distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-10194: The set_text_distance function did not prevent overflows in
  text-positioning calculation, which allowed remote attackers to cause a denial
  of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a
  crafted PDF document (bsc#1090099).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: The set_text_distance function in devices/vector/gdevpdts.c in the pdfwrite component in Artifex Ghostscript through 9.22 does not prevent overflows in text-positioning calculation, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PDF document.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
